# new CameraZoomRange(rangeParams)

**Constructor**

Creates an instance of a camera zoom range object with an object literal.

## Declaration

```swift
constructor(rangeParams: CameraZoomRangeConstructorOptions);
```

## Discussion

Calling the constructor with an [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CameraZoomRangeConstructorOptions] object literal creates a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CameraZoomRange] instance that constrains the camera.

Both [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CameraZoomRangeConstructorOptions/minCameraDistance] and [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CameraZoomRangeConstructorOptions/maxCameraDistance] must be greater than or equal to `0.` The [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CameraZoomRangeConstructorOptions/minCameraDistance] must be lower than or equal to the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CameraZoomRangeConstructorOptions/maxCameraDistance].

## Defining a zoom range

- **new CameraZoomRange()**: Constructs an instance of a camera zoom range object with no minimum or maximum camera distance.
- **new CameraZoomRange(min, max)**: Creates an instance of a camera zoom range object with the specified numeric arguments that specify minimum and maximum camera distances.
- **CameraZoomRangeConstructorOptions**: Initialization options for the camera zoom range.
